籤詩版本二:
It is said that it is not unheard of
Good clothes, good salary, natural prosperity
Don’t remember what happened back then
You agree with me
詩意: This hexagram is the image of a child seeing his mother. Good luck to all noble people.
解曰: Used for hope. Everyone is happy. From the public force. Like a son meeting his mother.
籤詩故事一:
◇Dong Zhong is looking for relatives
Dong Zhong was the son of Dong Yong in the Han Dynasty. He was born to a fairy from heaven who came down to earth to marry Dong Yong. Later, after the fairy helped Dong Yong pay off his debts and redeem himself, he returned to heaven.
Dong Zhong, who was seven years old, was often humiliated because he had no mother, so he wanted to find her.
Under the guidance of Mr. Yi, Dong Zhong went to Taibai Mountain to look for her on July 7th. The fairy appeared and finally saw his mother.
聖意:
The house is uneasy.
Myself mediocre.
Seek good fortune.
Transaction completed.
Marriage.
Liujia Female.
Pedestrians block.
Tian Can: Just.


Six animals are damaged.
Finding people is difficult.
Public litigation should be peaceful.
Migration. Conservatism.
Lost items are empty.
Disease Prayer.
Mountain tomb is auspicious.
古人: Dong Zhong is looking for relatives
